name: Last Planet (ernani, trickytriangles)
description:
STORY

Nature is gone and we are the protectors of the sacred tree. The LAST PLANET will survive

OBJECTIVE

Protect the Sacred Tree for the longest you can! Make soldiers kill invaders and miners dig crystals. 

HOW TO PLAY

Click on your soldiers and miners to create your strategy. They will always stop to mine.

  1. Left-mouse-button will change the ally unit direction
  2. If the Sacred Temple is destroyed you die
  3. You can buy new units, just click on the circle-button (Soldiers and Miners)
  4. Invaders spawn from time to time
  5. Crystals mines spawn from time to time 

CREDITS
